answers.answer: My Step Mom has the same thing and her's is caused by her diabetes. Maybe you should get checked.
thank you, I want to get checked out but it's embarassing eh? Do you know if they told her if you can get rid of it?

question: I am a 15 year old female and have discolouration on my neck, armpits, elbow creases, bra line, under my stomach and basically in every crease of my body. I am overweight and white. I first noticed about three years ago. It is embarassing because I can't where clothing that shows my arm pits. Can someone please tell me what this is or what to do? I really appreciate it.
title: Discoloured skin
